channel.title: Emote stop?

item.title: Emote stop?
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Suggest you use setAnimation(); instead. Or put this at the end of your code: resetAnimation();

Read full topic

item.title: Emote stop?
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

I don’t know too much about coding but maybe like… Something like this?

if(itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1623) { deleteItem(1623, getItemSlot(1623), 1); addItem(1607, 1); addSkillXP(100, 12); pEmote = 794; break; }
or…

if(itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1623) { deleteItem(1623, getItemSlot(1623), 1); addItem(1607, 1); addSkillXP(100, 12); pEmote = 794; return; }
Just a couple guesses for you to try. :
Sorry if I wasn’t helpful. could also use this for a nice bump.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote stop?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hey, i have this error, then i use the item on the item, i use a emote but, the emote will not stop.? how can i make it stop after one sec.

if(itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1623) { deleteItem(1623, getItemSlot(1623), 1); addItem(1607, 1); addSkillXP(100, 12); pEmote = 794; }
